Description: Thirteen glazed (faience) composition amygdaloid shape beads with grooves; probably mould-made and then glazed; yellowish grey in colour; no surviving glaze; perforated for suspension.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Hala Sultan Tekke, Uncertain tomb (?) Surface find (?)
Curator's comments: See also SCE IV/1D, 522, bead type no. 11 and fig. 70, 18; could also be included within bead type 3 ('oval...fluted), fig. 70, no. 12.
Bibliographic references: Bailey 1976 / Hala Sultan Tekke I. Excavations 1897-1971 (p. 18, pl. XVIIb)
